widget_gateway

class flow.gateways.widget_gateway.WidgetGateway(service_urls: dict)[source]

Bases: object

Widget gateway class used to hit Widget service endpoint.

create(token, flow: flow.aggregates.Flow, widget: flow.aggregates.Widget, step_position: dict, step_size: dict)[source]

Takes token, flow, widget, step_position, step_size and creates widget through widget api then returns created Step object

Parameters

  • token – bytes object

  • flow – Flow object

  • widget – Widget object

  • step_position – dict object

  • step_size – dict object

Returns

Step object

  • flow_id – str object
